race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Belgian Waffle Ride North Carolina’s 131 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Belgian Waffle Ride North Carolina. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Highly technical terrain at Belgian Waffle Ride North Carolina demands practice on similar surfaces. Ride technical rooty trails and rocky gravel — considerably more challenging than typical hard-pack at race-day cadence weekly. Practice cornering, descending, and power delivery on unstable surfaces. Dial in tire pressure before race week — 5 PSI wrong costs you 15+ minutes over 131 miles.
